News.headline: Loan Announcement: Joe White Joins Wealdstone FC
News.page_title: Loan Announcement: Joe White Joins Wealdstone FC
News.URL_keywords: Loan Announcement: Joe White Joins Wealdstone FC
News.short_description: Joe White has joined Wealdstone FC on loan until the 8th March 2017
News.description:
The Daggers can announce that forward Joe White has signed a one month loan with National League South club Wealdstone FC until Wednesday 8th March 2017.

The forward signed his first professional contract with the Daggers at the start of January and has made two appearances for the Daggers both coming from the bench.

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on how White is doing on his loan spell at Wealdstone FC.

Facebook: @OfficialDaggers

Twitter: @Dag_RedFC
